extensionName.description: The name of the extension displayed in the store and browser.

extensionDescription.message: A secure, reliable, cross-device sync tool for your personal prompts.
extensionDescription.description: A detailed description of the extension's purpose.

actionTitle.description: The title displayed when hovering over the extension's icon in the toolbar.

commandDescription.message: Open or close the Prompt Management Assistant sidebar
commandDescription.description: The description for the keyboard shortcut to open the side panel.
